invocations.description: Returns true if you are able to reach the specified location by walking there, false otherwise. Only the tiles on screen are considered unless you set the optional parameter fullreach to true in which case the bot will try to find a path through the tiles in a 256x256 box around your location, which is much slower.
invocations.ex:
if not tilereachable($attacked.posx, $attacked.posy, $attacked.posz) then
	ignorecreature($attacked)
end
invocations.exDescription: Will ignore the currently attacked creature if it's not reachable. Be careful, because it will only unignore it when you call ignorecreature again
